name: Cyberpunk 2777
description:
FAN MADE GAME

In the game you will take the role of a hacker who has a desire to get to the office CD Projekt Yellow and steal data about Cyberpunk 2777

GAME MECHANICS EXPLANATION

Hacking

To hack any mechanical object (only the turret in the game, lol), you need to equip "hack gun" and make a well-aimed shot. If you hit an object, it opens a mini-game in which you will need to click on all the buttons for a certain time. When the last button is pressed, the mechanism will start fighting on your side. If the mini-game failed, you will not be able to hack the same mechanism again.

Wall running

The second level will be added to the wall on which you will be able to run. All you have to do is just jump to that wall. While running along the wall you can make a jump.

CONTROLS:

WASD — Movement
Space — Jump
Left mouse button — Shot
F — Hide a weapon
1 — Pistol
2 — HACK gun
3 — Assault rifle (It will be available on the second level)
